query:
SELECT 
  s.id,
  s.registrationNumber,
  s.fullName,
  GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(sub.name, ' (', sub.code, ')') SEPARATOR ', ') as enrolled_subjects
FROM students s
LEFT JOIN subjectEnrollments se ON s.id = se.studentId
LEFT JOIN subjects sub ON se.subjectId = sub.id
GROUP BY s.id, s.registrationNumber, s.fullName
LIMIT 10;

LEFT JOIN subjectEnrollments se ON s.id = se.studentId
LEFT JOIN subjects sub ON se.subjectId = sub.id
GROUP BY s.id, s.registrationNumber, s.fullName
